title: BT Group : Adjusted revenues 2008 to 2019
summary: In general Revenue in million GBP has fallen over the Year.
Revenue in million GBP is slightly decreasing from 2012 to 2013, roughly constant from 2013 to 2014, and finally slightly decreasing from 2014 to 2015.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2012 and 2013.
The highest Revenue in million GBP, of value 19397.0 was reached at Year 2012
Minimum Revenue in million GBP about 17840.0 was reached at Year 2015
